the cardioid pattern effectively captures vocals and minimizes ambient noise making it ideal for vocal applications.

body.description: Plug in and rock out with the new JBL PBM100 Wired Microphone, the perfect vocal performance mic for your JBL PartyBox speaker. Engineered specifically to pair with the full line of JBL PartyBox speakers, the PBM100 delivers a sound experience like no other. Easy plug-n-play setup lets you instantly sing along to your favorite tunes. With the PMB100, you can turn parties into superstar sing-alongs guaranteed to create memories to last a lifetime. Let the party get started!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: JBL PBM100 Wired Microphone Wired Dynamic Vocal Mic with Cable_Plug in and rock out with the new JBL PBM100 Wired Microphone, the perfect vocal performance mic for your JBL PartyBox speaker. Engineered specifically to pair with the full line of JBL PartyBox speakers, the PBM100 delivers a sound experience like no other. Easy plug-n-play setup lets you instantly sing along to your favorite tunes. With the PMB100, you can turn parties into superstar sing-alongs to create memories to last a lifetime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome mic at a great price
reviews.reviewText: The JBL speaker microphone is an absolute gem! I couldn't be happier with this purchase. The sound quality is superb, producing crystal-clear audio with impressive bass for its size. It effortlessly fills a room with music, making it perfect for gatherings or outdoor adventures.The microphone function works flawlessly, making it a versatile device for conference calls or karaoke sessions. Pairing it with my devices was a breeze, and the Bluetooth connectivity is rock-solid.Its sleek design and durable build make it not only functional but also stylish. The battery life is impressive, lasting for hours on a single charge.In short, the JBL speaker microphone is a 5-star performer in both audio quality and functionality. It's a must-have for music enthusiasts and professionals alike.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Party box microhone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great sound and works well with the party box speaker! Highly recommend! It would be nice to have a little light on it to make sure it is on, but minor detail.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! >>>> J >>> U >>> N >>> K !!!!!
reviews.reviewText: What does that spell? JUNK!!Yes you heard it correctly. It's JUNK!!If you're looking forward to wasting $50-something dollars for a mic that does not work, this is it! I have bought JBL Products before, and this time I AM SOOOOO VERY DISAPPOINTED!! The mic does not work! I did as instructed, and the instructions are easy too, but it doesn't work!! When I received the package today, it came opened! Don't waste your money! I feel like they just gave me a returned item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the JBL Partybox
reviews.reviewText: This microphone is the perfect match to your JBL Partybox speaker for rockin' Karaoke nights. The sound is crisp and can be heard clearly at both indoor or outdoor parties with ease. Like any microphone, standing too close to or directly in front of the speaker will induce feedback so be mindful of where you stand in relation to the speaker when in smaller or confined spaces. Other than that, I have no complaints and it works perfectly for what it is intended to do. It's a reasonably priced microphone for those family and friends parties where Karaoke is part of the fun! I would recommend it to anyone who owns a JBL Partybox speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for a professional setting.
reviews.reviewText: The mics sound good. Not great. These are more for a backyard karaoke party with friends. Very light and plastic type casing. On a good drop it will def break. Very light weight which can be good or bad depending on the situation. I needed something quick and wanted to match my speaker sets for a party so im stuck with it. They have better mics for the same price that are a little more durable.
Muito bom.. som sai super bem.. adorei
Tiene un excelente sonido no hay interferencia.

It’s just a waste of money! They deliver defective product and it’s totally not working! No wonder why POD option is not available for this product. They’re just trying to deceive you by sending defective products. Believe it or not!

reviews.reviewTitle: 軽量でよい音のマイク
reviews.reviewText: 良い音のするマイクです。軽いので手には負荷を感じません。カラオケのセットに接続してご機嫌に使っています。ありがとうございます。
